issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
-appcelerator start up, automatic install reports error: cannot find cli
-help->install sdk->error: java null pointer exception
-sudo npm install -g titanium-> no error, no installation

h3. Actual Result
unable to install titanium cli

h3. Expected Result
titanium cli installation

comments.body:
Hello [~fulvio.difrancesco@gmail.com],

Please follow the steps below and let me know.

*Open terminal and run below commands :*
 
1. Check if Java JDK is installed: java --version (if not installed you can download it from [here |http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk7-downloads-1880260.html] )
 2. Ensure that you have Node.JS installed:  node --version (if not installed then you can download it from [here| https://web.appcelerator.com/product/cli])
3. Install the Appcelerator CLI: sudo npm install appcelerator -g
4. appc setup
Login to Studio from terminal using below command and then open your Studio:
appc login
*If the problem still persist then:*
*Uninstall SDK:*
appc ti sdk uninstall (SDK version)
*Install SDK:*
appc ti sdk install latest or
appc ti sdk install (SDK version)

Thanks
